page.title: 14The Doctors' Surgery.
page.content: The main doctors' surgery is in Petworth. The surgery has got four doctors who are called Doctor Lyon, Doctor Morgan, Doctor Lee and Doctor Bell. In Kirdford there is a village call office in which every Wednesday a doctor comes with no one else unless he has student doctors with him. The official time which he is allowed to stay is one hour. There is no chemist in Kirdford so a van comes from Petworth Surgery about five miles from Kirdford and drops off the medicines which have been prescribed by the doctors. The people then come to collect them and take them home. A Health Visitor comes to the Village Hall on Monday afternoons.
